venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
The Dark Knight Rises is the final film in Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy. It stars the usual gang: Christian Bale as Bruce Wayne/Batman, Gary Oldman as Police Commissioner Gordon, Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, and Morgan Freeman as friend and Wayne Foundation administrator Lucius Fox. It also has Tom Hardy as Bane and Anne Hatheway as Catwoman. The Dark Knight was possibly the best superhero movie ever, so I'm really looking forward to this one.

Eight years after Batman took the fall for Two Face's crimes, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

There's a 4:45 PM show at Blackstone Valley Cinema. Let's meet in the lobby at 4:15. Hopefully, that will give us enough time to find seats together. Anyone who wants to can join me for dinner afterwards.

If you need to reach me, call or text my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

- David Bainbridge

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Dark Knight Rises - Meet at 4:15 for 4:45 show
